name: Readable Sub and Sup Text on Tumblr Dash
description: Makes <sub>subscript</sub> and <sup>superscript</sup> appear in a slightly larger font (12px) which is still smaller than the default font size on the tumblr site. Does not alter blogs.
additional_info: Some roleplayers have taken to using subscript and superscript instead of small text when attempting to conserve dash space, thanks to tumblr's ridiculous change to break small text. Unfortunately, sub and sup are quite a bit smaller and harder to read (on tumblr) than standard small text. This style is made to return those to a readable font size, which is still smaller than the default text size so as to preserve the effect. For a more drastic approach, see the twin of this style, which makes sub and sup appear in the same default size as other text on the dash. Should now work with SSL security enabled.
